players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob was killed, so Diana or Charlie must be the mafia. I'm leaning toward Charlie being suspicious."
Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and discovered she is the mafioso. We need to vote her out immediately."
Charlie: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice instead of Bob? That seems odd since Bob was the obvious kill target."
You: "Diana, if you're the real detective, why did you wait until after Charlie questioned you to claim? That seems like a reactive lie to save yourself."
Charlie: "Diana, if you're the detective, why investigate Alice? Bob was the obvious kill target. Your claim seems reactive and suspicious."
Diana: "Charlie, I investigated Alice because detectives typically investigate randomly on Night 1 since we have no information yet. Alice killed Bob and is now trying to deflect suspicion onto us."
